name: Machu Picchu Tour, 2 Days
description:
This is the shortest time to visit this wonderful Inca site, considered the seven wonder in the world. 

On the way by bus you are able to see the highlands of Cusco, the Sacred Valley and the Urubamba river, also the train lays along the Urubamba river bank to Aguas Calientes.
After having your guided tour in Machu Picchu you can go to the mountain of Huayna Picchu ( it takes 2 hours ) or go to Machu Picchu mountain ( it takes 3 and a half hours, you can also go to the sun gate which takes 2 and a half hours round trip or go to the Inca bridge, it is needed 1 and a half hours round trip from the Guard House).
You can start this tour just arriving to Cusco, to leave towards Aguas Calientes the same day in the afternoon being the shortest time to explore all about Machu Picchu and its surroundings.
